name: Extrusion Dies Industries
overview: Extrusion Dies Industries, LLC designs and builds flat extrusion dies and coating heads for plastics processors and Web converters. It offers extrusion/coextrusion dies, such as cast films, oriented films, extrusion coating dies, sheet dies, compounding/pelletizing dies, polyside/stripe dies, RPVC siding dies, tape/slit films, and twin wall dies; and adjustable and fixed geometry coextrusion feed blocks. The company also provides slot die coating systems, such as lip coating systems and auxiliary equipment; auxiliary equipment, including cleaning/maintenance stations, deckling systems, die carts, distribution blocks/adapters, UltraSplit on-line die separation devices, and vacuum boxes; and die systems for extruded polystyrene foam board applications. In addition, it offers after market services, such as on-site and customer support; and rework dies and spare parts. The company serves barrier film and sheet, cast film, compounding and pelletizing, extrusion coating, flexible packaging, fluid coating, optical film, oriented film, solar power photovoltaic, and thermoformed sheet markets. It offers its products through a network of agents in Latin America, Europe, Asia, and Australia. Extrusion Dies Industries, LLC was formerly known as Extrusion Dies, Inc. and changed its name in October 2002. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Chippewa Falls, Wisconsin with service centers in Reichshof-Wehnrath, Germany; and Shanghai, China, as well as a licensed rework facility in Japan.
